TopicTitle: Walking into any part of any craft on EVA will cause it to move.

Articles.Content:
Fairly self-explanatory.

If you EVA a kerbal and walk into a part of a craft, you will apply a force onto the craft. This works even when on the craft itself, thus creating a kraken drive.
Similar - EVA kerbal touches a craft  (was with feet) and lost almost all orbital velocity (RIP Jeb)
